Instruction: Brown ground beef in a hot Dutch oven, breaking it into small pieces. Add onions and bell pepper and cook until beef is browned and vegetables are soft. Drain excess grease by pressing the mixture in a sieve.

After sautéing the onions, garlic, and ground beef in a skillet, add the diced tomatoes, kidney beans, chili powder, and salt. Stir well until combined. Allow the chili to simmer on low heat for about 20-30 minutes to let the flavors meld.
